subject: Re: svn commit: samba r22495 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/source: . smbd
body:

>

> >http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=22495
> >

> >Create wrapper to hide the details of obtaining a set of sockets

> 
> Jeremy, if you're happy with this, I'll do the equivalent to  
> winbindd ...

Yes, this looked ok to me - thanks !

Jeremy
